function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Absence of on-site storage for domestic hot water due to healthcare legislation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Performance matrix indicates acceptable scores in the majority of criteria, but with some areas for improvement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Absence of onsite electricity generation and storage units","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low scores in energy management domains","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Healthcare legislation restriction on onsite storage for domestic hot water","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High impact score in majority of assessment criteria","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High scores in majority of impact criteria","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low scores in flexibility and storage criteria","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low ventilation score 89%","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High overall impact scores 72-80%","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive impact criteria in building domains may lead to increased human traffic and interaction, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low level of control functionalities in the majority of domains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of reported information on ev charging capability may lead to unmonitored and unregulated usage, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread through surface contact on ev charging stations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of smart grid integration","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concentration of people in healthcare building","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legislative constraints prevent the storage of locally produced electricity, leading to suboptimal consumption.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant electricity loads are metered, leading to poor visibility and control over electricity consumption.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant heating loads are metered","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information sharing and collaboration between technical managers in healthcare facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of information involves interacting with building staff and users, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex equations and technical language make it difficult for non-experts to understand the risk assessment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evaluation matrix may not capture all relevant impact criteria, leading to incomplete assessment of bacs design and functionalities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases within healthcare facilities due to suboptimal building automation and control systems bacs design and functionality.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper auditing and evaluation of building automation and control systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate economic and technical impacts assessment of bacs improvement packages.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited evaluation and assessment of building automation and control systems bacs design and operation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimal consideration and evaluation of bacs design and operation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evaluation and assessment of building automation and control systems could lead to design flaws that impact building performance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring and control of building automation systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive assessment of building domains for disease transmission risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of auditing and design evaluation of bacs in smart buildings leading to large energy performance gaps and suboptimal control systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient building automation and control system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor hygiene and sanitation practices","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multiple parameters comprising the iaq category, leading to non-compliance if one parameter exceeds the relevant threshold.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assessment of thermal comfort, lighting, and iaq compliance only during occupied hours 8am -6pm, and acoustic compliance during unoccupied hours 7pm -7am after the air conditioning system has started.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Samba device unaware of its location, with data packets assigned to a ’zone’ based on instructions established within the dashboard.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupant density fluctuations throughout the working day","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Innovation in pervasive sensor technologies and wireless communication protocols.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of national or international guidelines for hcho and tvoc parameters","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of weekends and public holidays from compliance metrics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity in occupancy during ’fringe’ hours 7-8am and 7-8pm","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time updates and dynamic content may encourage user interaction but also increase the risk of contagious disease propagation if the dashboard is accessed by infected individuals.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of historical data through the dashboard may hinder comprehensive analysis of building performance, including the tracking of long-term trends and patterns in indoor environmental quality.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Automatic generation and distribution of weekly reports may lead to complacency among users in conducting their own detailed follow-up diagnostics, potentially overlooking critical issues in indoor environmental quality.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of data quality and accuracy due to complex sensing environments and variances in indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of inadequate data representation and insight generation from ieq measurements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ad-hoc wireless network may interfere with host building’s existing services or information/communication networks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wireless mesh network for data relay may result in data transmission delays or interruptions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of native python environment for processing sensor data and additional computing tasks may pose security vulnerabilities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spurious measurements in the data stream","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
